name: The Crash: Storm Clouds of the Mind (Windows)
name_original: The Crash: Storm Clouds of the Mind (Windows)
description:
(This is the windows version of my first Game Jam project. It was made on a Mac, so I won't be surprised if there are issues.)

(Before you download and comment, please be aware that this is my first game, my first Yume Nikki fan game, my first game jam, parallaxing, using my own art, uploading to the Internet, etc. I go more into it on the Mac download, but the point is it's not fantastic. But I would like to receive some feedback to know what I can do to improve.)

(You play as Elizabeth, a college student in the sixties who's plagued by strange dreams. Collect at least three effects, watch a few events, and explore the three overworlds and seven small sub-worlds. There are two endings. Besides technical support, I won't be adding much.)
